title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 500.2
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 500.2

State Regulations

The Civil Rights Bureau of the Office of the New York State

Attorney General shall be referred to herein as the "civil rights bureau" or
"CRB."
Notes

500.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 11, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 37, eff. 9/22/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
